name: Thomas G. DAVIS, et al., petitioners, v. PENSION BENEFIT GUARANTY CORPORATION.
name_abbreviation: Davis v. Pension Benefit Guaranty Corp.

court.name: Supreme Court of the United States

parties:
Thomas G. DAVIS, et al., petitioners,
v.
PENSION BENEFIT GUARANTY CORPORATION.
attorneys: Motion of Delta Pilots' Pension Preservation Organization (DPS3, Inc.) for leave to file a brief as amicus curiae granted. Motion of The Coalition of Airline Pilots Associations, et al. for leave to file a brief as amici curiae granted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the District of Columbia Circuit denied.
casebody.head_matter:
Thomas G. DAVIS, et al., petitioners,
v.
PENSION BENEFIT GUARANTY CORPORATION.
No. 13-1280.
Supreme Court of the United States
June 30, 2014.
Case below, 734 F.3d 1161.
Motion of Delta Pilots' Pension Preservation Organization (DPS3, Inc.) for leave to file a brief as amicus curiae granted. Motion of The Coalition of Airline Pilots Associations, et al. for leave to file a brief as amici curiae granted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the District of Columbia Circuit denied.
